org.mindswap.owl
Interface OWLWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
OWLWriterImpl
public interface OWLWriter

OWL writer implement functionality to serialize OWL models by writing them to a Writer or OutputStream using some standardized format such as RDF/XML or Turtle.
